'''Front door treatment''' :

- Essential for reducing the risk of relapse

- Treatment is medical +/- surgical (drainage)

- If the bacteremia is linked to foreign material: removal is often necessary

- Treatment of secondary locations: see specific items

question.title: What is a key principle of gateway treatment for bacteremia/fungemia?

option_a.title: Treatment is medical only
option_a.description: This option suggests that surgical intervention is not necessary

option_b.title: Removal of foreign material is always necessary
option_b.description: This option implies that foreign material is always present and must be removed

option_c.title: Treatment is medical +/- surgical (drainage)
option_c.description: This option accurately reflects the principles of gateway treatment

option_d.title: Treatment is surgical only
option_d.description: This option suggests that medical intervention is not necessary
